unknown_responses.rationale: Describes scientific work/studies (capability) ('fight to publish their studies') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes expert opinion/assessment, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a response measure ('were euthanized') and lack of clarity (related to investigation/capability) without explicit calming keywords.
Describes detection (surveillance capability) ('infections... have been detected') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes uncertainty/difficulty in investigation (related to capability) ('one cannot say with certainty') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes reporting (surveillance capability) ('increasing reports of spillover events') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes assessment/situation, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a fact mitigating concern, not capability or preparedness.
Describes reporting (surveillance capability) ('reports of human cases are rare') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes a past event/case, not capability or preparedness.
Describes past events/cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a past event/case, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a recent event/case, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hypothesis/assessment (related to research capability) ('school of thought is that the decline... is due to genetic changes') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes virus characteristics, not capability or preparedness.
Describes virus characteristics/origin, not capability or preparedness.
Describes historical data/assessment (related to research capability) ('human infections... were caused by viruses that had that combination') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes virus evolution (related to research capability) ('acquired other internal genes through reassortment') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes personal concern, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a future possibility (negative) ('There will be a new pandemic for sure') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes a future possibility (negative) and uncertainty ('There will be a new pandemic for sure. Whether it... I don't know.') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes agreement on a point, not capability or preparedness.
Describes expert opinion/recommendation (related to strategy/preparedness) ('think... the world would be better off focusing') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes past involvement in investigations (response/capability) ('involved in the investigations') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes other threats/risks, not capability or preparedness.
Describes sampling (surveillance capability) ('if you sample pigs, you will find') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes recommendation/call for preparedness ('needs to invest more in being ready to detect and mitigate') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes concern about eroded response capacity (preparedness) ('eroded political support for this type of work') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes concern about public support (related to response/preparedness) ('worries about what... has done to public support') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes concern about public response/control measures (capability) ('difficult to get the public to do anything to try to limit or control') without explicit calming keywords.
Describes assessment of the challenge, not capability or preparedness.
Describes assessment of ability/capability ('whether people... have the ability to actually address the challenge') without explicit calming keywords.
